name: Research Console
description:
<!-- Summary Start -->A specialized control console used for a single research purpose.<!-- Summary End --> A group of research consoles installed in a dedicated volume is a Laboratory, functioning in the manner of an auxiliary ACS Bridge.

Reseaarch consoles are available at multiple technology levels and the mass varies with the technology level.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
